You asked several=
 questions, so I'll take them one at a time:

1) you hope what? that i made=
 a fool out of myself or that i called it in or perhaps both?=C2=A0 

I hop=
e you called it in. Your resistance to giving the police information you sa=
id you thought you had on a child abductor, even after several prompts, mak=
es me hope you did call it in, and didn't just say that to stop me from pro=
mpting you. I don't know of course, I am not there. I have no desire that y=
ou make a fool of yourself, but if it helps save a child from am abductor, =
I think it would be worth it.

2) Why don't you get on the box, and do some=
 asking? 

As I have said in the past, my experience with those boxes has s=
hown me nothing paranormal yet.=C2=A0 However, people continue to say there=
 is more to it than my experience.=C2=A0 And so, I am keeping an open mind =
and trying to examine the evidence you provide.

3) Why are negative people=
 on
 these lists anyway. if you guys don't believe in this type of technolo=
gy, why the heck are you all here? 

If I had absolulely no belief that the=
re might be something interesting going on with the technology, I would not=
 have been so insistent that you give your information to the police.=C2=A0=
 How could a person, of good conscience, not prompt you to give that inform=
ation to the police?=C2=A0 Again how is that a negative thing to do?

Would=
n't the really negative thing be to ignore it?
